holylight.description: Holylight: A Nanophotonic Accelerator for Deep Learning. Optimized for photonic convolution and dense layers with digital support. Source: DATE 2019.

dac_energy_per_bit.source: From Table I: 8 mW total power for 1024 DACs → 7.8 µW/DAC = 7.8e-6 W / 1e9 bps = 7.8 pJ/bit

static_power.source: Derived from HolyLight Table I: EO disks = 20.97 W (128×128 array × 1.28 mW/disk), resonators = 0.164 W, laser = 0.1 W. Total = 21.234 W ≈ 21.24 W

area_per_mul_lane.source: Compact photonic MAC layout with MRRs

waveguide_pitch.source: Standard in dense silicon photonic layouts

adc_energy_per_sample.source: Derived from Table I in HolyLight paper: 2 mW ADC per channel @ 1.28 GS/s → 2e-3 W / 1.28e9 samples = 1.56 pJ/sample

dynamic_power.source: From HolyLight Table I: includes 2.048 W (ADC), 0.008 W (DAC), 1.877 W (MVM tiles), and 2.2 W (shift-add + PCA). Total ≈ 6.133 W
